databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT PRM_1, PRM_2, PRM_3, PRM_4, PRM_5, PRM_6, PRM_7, PRM_8, PRM_9, PRM_10, MAINTENANCE_FLAG, MAINTENANCE_MESSAGE, RELEASE_VERSION, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_USER_ID, TS
FROM SN_PARAMETER

INSERT INTO SN_PARAMETER ( PRM_1, PRM_2, PRM_3, PRM_4, PRM_5, PRM_6, PRM_7, PRM_8, PRM_9, PRM_10, MAINTENANCE_FLAG, MAINTENANCE_MESSAGE, RELEASE_VERSION, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_USER_ID, TS ) VALUES( :PRM_1, :PRM_2, :PRM_3, :PRM_4, :PRM_5, :PRM_6, :PRM_7, :PRM_8, :PRM_9, :PRM_10, :MAINTENANCE_FLAG, :MAINTENANCE_MESSAGE, :RELEASE_VERSION, :SEND_FLAG, :VESSEL_ID, :DATA_NO, :USER_KEY, :RENEW_USER_ID, :TS )

UPDATE SN_PARAMETER SET PRM_1 = :PRM_1, PRM_2 = :PRM_2, PRM_3 = :PRM_3, PRM_4 = :PRM_4, PRM_5 = :PRM_5, PRM_6 = :PRM_6, PRM_7 = :PRM_1, PRM_8 = :PRM_8, PRM_9 = :PRM_9, PRM_10 = :PRM_10, MAINTENANCE_FLAG = :MAINTENANCE_FLAG, MAINTENANCE_MESSAGE = :MAINTENANCE_MESSAGE, RELEASE_VERSION = :RELEASE_VERSION, SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO, USER_KEY = :USER_KEY, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID, TS = :TS
